item.title: 新 ETF 的需求帮助比特币创下历史新高，但许多财务顾问仍不得向客户推荐这些基金

item.title: Capital One 的一位高管表示，投资者普遍对公司收购 Discover 的计划持积极态度，他们的问题主要集中在交易批准前的监管障碍上。
item.description:
A Capital One executive said investors have generally been positive about the company’s plans to acquire Discover, focusing their questions primarily on the regulatory hurdles ahead of the deal’s approval. https://t.co/W9bcHnJgXI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 美国最大的公共养老基金在经历了长期的回报低迷和领导层变动之后，正在从外部物色下一任首席信息官。
item.description:
The largest US public pension fund is looking externally for its next CIO, following a long spell of lackluster returns and leadership churn https://t.co/VR0xQ1YlIE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 官员称，海地陷入困境的总理周二在波多黎各登陆，他试图返回海地平息激增的帮派暴力袭击事件（via AP）
item.description:
Haiti’s embattled prime minister landed in Puerto Rico on Tuesday as he tried to return to Haiti to quell a surge in violent gang attacks, officials said (via AP) https://t.co/BSGkNcgzTG

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）向国会作证之前，交易员们浏览了大部分糟糕的经济数据，导致美国股市下跌
item.description:
US stocks fell as traders waded through mostly poor economic data ahead of Jerome Powell’s testimony to Congress https://t.co/ZwKpBwT3mL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 在杰罗姆-鲍威尔发表证词之前，交易员们浏览了大部分糟糕的经济数据，受科技股拖累，美国股市回落
item.description:
US stocks retreated, dragged down by tech, as traders waded through mostly poor economic data before Jerome Powell’s testimony https://t.co/XXs2kmCc7i

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 虽然今晚的焦点集中在 "超级星期二"，但明天的焦点--至少对投资者和经济学家来说--将回到华盛顿，集中在美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔的国会证词上。
item.description:
While the attention tonight is on Super Tuesday, the focus tomorrow — at least for investors and economists — will be back on Washington on Fed Chair Jerome Powell's congressional testimony https://t.co/7XQrFsE1h1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 亚特兰大联邦储备银行的数据显示，近几个月来，大多数美国工人的加薪幅度都超过了通货膨胀率--但平均数掩盖了异常值，越来越多的工人的工资被冻结。
item.description:
Most US workers have been getting pay hikes that exceed the rate of inflation in recent months — but the average hides the outliers, and a growing share are seeing their wages frozen, data from the Federal Reserve Bank of Atlanta shows. https://t.co/L8iuIigO8Q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 一时间，几乎所有投资比特币的人都获利颇丰。现在，随着加密货币从历史新高回落，所有人都不禁要问，"卖出新闻 "的交易还能持续多久。
item.description:
For a moment, nearly everyone who ever invested in Bitcoin was profitable. Now, with the cryptocurrency retreating from its still fresh record high, all are left to wonder how long they’ll be caught up in the “sell-the-news” trade that's followed. https://t.co/HiJq18OPfO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 日本央行前执行董事表示，在最早的情况下，日本央行可能需要至少九年时间才能实现资产负债表正常化。
item.description:
The Bank of Japan will probably need at least nine years to normalize its balance sheet in the earliest-case scenario, according to a former executive director https://t.co/hNmfVXrXzs

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: AllianceBernstein 表示，渴望长期持有比特币的投资者最好购买加密货币矿业公司的股票。
item.description:
Investors eager to gain long-term exposure to Bitcoin may be better off buying shares of the companies that mine the cryptocurrency, AllianceBernstein said https://t.co/zAek9cmyoO

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 委内瑞拉表示将于 7 月举行总统选举，为尼古拉斯-马杜罗连任创造条件

item.title: 耶鲁大学、达特茅斯大学和布朗大学表示，他们将再次强制要求学生参加 SAT 和 ACT 等标准化考试。这对有抱负的大学生意味着什么？
item.description:
Yale, Dartmouth and Brown say they're making standardized tests like the SAT and the ACT mandatory again. Here's what that means for aspiring college students https://t.co/dQmSrNX0ni

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 加拿大自然资源部长表示，中国投资不能解决资金短缺的加拿大矿商寻求资金支持的问题
item.description:
Chinese investment can’t be the solution for cash-strapped Canadian miners seeking financial backing, according to Canada’s natural resources minister https://t.co/W9UKPe7Q57

item.title: 随着投资者对虐待行为的关注与日俱增，今年提出的动物福利决议数量也创下了历史新高
item.description:

item.title: 伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）和多位民主党参议员敦促拜登的卫生官员打击私人医疗保险优势计划，认为保险公司每年向政府多收取数百亿美元的费用
item.description:
Elizabeth Warren and top Democratic senators urged Biden health officials to crack down on private Medicare Advantage plans, arguing insurance companies overcharge the government by tens of billions of dollars a year https://t.co/SaNFirYgWI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 世界需要大量太阳能。以下是该行业在安装太阳能电池板的地点和方式方面的一些创新方法

item.title: 布朗大学再次要求学生参加 SAT 或 ACT 考试，这是继流感疫情暂停后，今年第三所宣布恢复标准化考试的常春藤盟校。
item.description:
Brown University is again requiring the SAT or ACT for admission, becoming the third Ivy League college this year to announce a return to standardized testing following a pause caused by the pandemic. https://t.co/ZAsyIC5yYW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 习近平主席呼吁地方政府因地制宜发展 "新生产力"，避免在特定行业制造泡沫
item.description:
President Xi Jinping called for local governments to develop “new productive forces” according to their local conditions and to avoid creating a bubble in particular industries https://t.co/CucajhuPrP

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 交易所交易基金的投资者似乎对 "数字黄金 "更有信心，比特币的拥护者通常把比特币称为 "数字黄金"，而不是真正的贵金属，因为每一种比特币的价格都创下了历史新高。
item.description:
Exchange-traded fund investors appear to be more confident in “digital gold,” as Bitcoin is often referred to by advocates, than the actual precious metal as each one sets record high prices. https://t.co/wzSJoWtn5Y

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024

item.title: 乌克兰最高能源官员排除了允许俄罗斯天然气继续流经该国的任何商业协议
item.description:
Ukraine’s top energy official ruled out any commercial agreements to allow Russian natural gas to continue flowing through the country https://t.co/zIyEawx9iX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024
